CDE-101.Title: Sunset Sailing Cruise
CDE-101.Description: Experience the magic of sunset from the water on our luxury sailing yacht. Cruise along the coastline as the sky transforms with vibrant colors. Our experienced captain will ensure a smooth and memorable journey while you enjoy complimentary drinks and light snacks.

CDE-102.Title: Wine Tasting Tour
CDE-102.Description: Discover the region's finest wineries on this guided tour. Visit three distinctive vineyards, learn about winemaking processes, and sample a variety of premium wines. Our knowledgeable guides will share insights about wine appreciation and local viticulture traditions.

CDE-103.Title: Helicopter City Tour
CDE-103.Description: Soar above the city skyline in a state-of-the-art helicopter for an unforgettable aerial adventure. See iconic landmarks from a unique perspective and capture stunning photos. Your pilot will provide interesting commentary about the city's history and architecture throughout the flight.
